name: Business Entry Champions
title: Top Business Entry Score
description: In 2024, Greece achieved a remarkable business entry score of 96.58, showcasing its robust framework for new businesses.

name: Digital Transparency Masters
title: Leading in Digital Public Services
description: Greece scored 94.50 in digital public services and transparency for business entry in 2024, reflecting its commitment to digital innovation.

name: Trade Facilitation Experts
title: Excellence in International Trade Services
description: With a score of 96.11 in 2024, Greece excels in providing quality public services that facilitate international trade.

name: Educational Overachievers
title: High Tertiary Enrollment Rates
description: In 2022, Greece boasted a gross tertiary enrollment rate of 166.67%, with female enrollment at 171.99% and male at 161.73%.

name: Surgical Workforce Leaders
title: Abundant Specialist Surgical Workforce
description: As of 2015, Greece had 163.54 specialist surgeons per 100,000 population, indicating a strong healthcare infrastructure.

name: Agricultural Decline
title: Significant Drop in Agricultural Growth
description: In 2023, Greece experienced a -26.83% growth in agriculture, forestry, and fishing, highlighting a sector in distress.

name: Operational Efficiency Struggles
title: Challenges in Business Location Efficiency
description: Greece scored 49.00 in operational efficiency for establishing business locations in 2024, indicating room for improvement.

name: Primary Education Success
title: Minimal Primary School Dropouts
description: In 2022, only 0.0022% of primary school-aged children were out of school in Greece, reflecting a strong primary education system.
